Uses of Class
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Container

  • Packages that use Container 
    Package Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui  

    • Uses of Container in com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui

      Methods in com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui that return Container 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Container Container.align(int align)
      Sets the alignment of the widget within the container.
      Container Container.background(Drawable background) 
      Container Container.bottom()
      Sets Align.bottom and clears Align.top for the alignment of the widget within the container.
      Container Container.center()
      Sets the alignment of the widget within the container to Align.center.
      Container Container.fill()
      Sets fillX and fillY to 1.
      Container Container.fill(boolean fill)
      Sets fillX and fillY to 1 if true, 0 if false.
      Container Container.fill(boolean x, boolean y)
      Sets fillX and fillY to 1 if true, 0 if false.
      Container Container.fill(float x, float y) 
      Container Container.fillX()
      Sets fillX to 1.
      Container Container.fillY()
      Sets fillY to 1.
      Container Container.height(float height)
      Sets the minHeight, prefHeight, and maxHeight to the specified value.
      Container Container.left()
      Sets Align.left and clears Align.right for the alignment of the widget within the container.
      Container Container.maxHeight(float maxHeight) 
      Container Container.maxSize(float size)
      Sets the maxWidth and maxHeight to the specified value.
      Container Container.maxSize(float width, float height)
      Sets the maxWidth and maxHeight to the specified values.
      Container Container.maxWidth(float maxWidth) 
      Container Container.minHeight(float minHeight) 
      Container Container.minSize(float size)
      Sets the minWidth and minHeight to the specified value.
      Container Container.minSize(float width, float height)
      Sets the minWidth and minHeight to the specified values.
      Container Container.minWidth(float minWidth) 
      Container Container.pad(float pad)
      Sets the padTop, padLeft, padBottom, and padRight to the specified value.
      Container Container.pad(float top, float left, float bottom, float right) 
      Container Container.padBottom(float padBottom) 
      Container Container.padLeft(float padLeft) 
      Container Container.padRight(float padRight) 
      Container Container.padTop(float padTop) 
      Container Container.prefHeight(float prefHeight) 
      Container Container.prefSize(float size)
      Sets the prefWidth and prefHeight to the specified value.
      Container Container.prefSize(float width, float height)
      Sets the prefWidth and prefHeight to the specified values.
      Container Container.prefWidth(float prefWidth) 
      Container Container.right()
      Sets Align.right and clears Align.left for the alignment of the widget within the container.
      Container Container.size(float size)
      Sets the minWidth, prefWidth, maxWidth, minHeight, prefHeight, and maxHeight to the specified value.
      Container Container.size(float width, float height)
      Sets the minWidth, prefWidth, maxWidth, minHeight, prefHeight, and maxHeight to the specified values.
      Container Container.top()
      Sets Align.top and clears Align.bottom for the alignment of the widget within the container.
      Container Container.width(float width)
      Sets the minWidth, prefWidth, and maxWidth to the specified value.
